description:
**• Tracking and embedded advertisements that are hard/impossible to disable and turn themselves back on after an update.
• Preloaded with sponsored apps and games.
• Costs money to download and use beyond the trial period.
- Enterprise and LTSB editions cannot be used for more than one hour at a time after trial expires
• Customization of user experience is extremely limited.
• No real package manager out of the box.

See `sudo info recommended` for a list of recommended Linux distros.**
